title: Episode 27: From Insane Asylum to Psychiatric Center: A Brief History
description:
Join me for an interview with Dr. Roger Christenfeld, Research Director of the Hudson River Psychiatric Center. Dr. Christenfeld and I talk about how psychiatric patients were treated in the heyday...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
content:encoded: Join me for an interview with Dr. Roger Christenfeld, Research Director of the Hudson River Psychiatric Center. Dr. Christenfeld and I talk about how psychiatric patients were treated in the heyday... Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
itunes:subtitle: Find out what life was like on an "Insane Asylum" 100 years ago. It's probably not what you think.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
